sentences.en: A few days earlier somebody had rear-ended him.
sentences.cn: 几天之前他的车被人追尾了。

sentences.en: Carole was left to bring up the rear.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔被落在最后。

sentences.en: He settled back in the rear of the taxi.
sentences.cn: 他靠坐在出租车的后排座上。

sentences.en: I got a ding in my rear fender.
sentences.cn: 我汽车后面的挡泥板撞瘪了一处。

sentences.en: It’s a good place to rear young children.
sentences.cn: 这地方非常适合抚养小孩子成长。

sentences.en: Knock at the rear entrance.
sentences.cn: 敲后门。

sentences.en: Musicians played at the front and rear of the procession.
sentences.cn: 乐师们在队前和队尾表演。

sentences.en: Reporters intercepted him as he tried to leave by the rear entrance.
sentences.cn: 他想从后门溜走,记者把他截住了.

sentences.en: She reared sixteen children, six her own and ten her husband's.
sentences.cn: 她抚养大了16个孩子，6个她自己的，10个她丈夫的。

sentences.en: The baggage followed in the rear of the troops on march.
sentences.cn: 辎重跟随在行进军队的后部.

sentences.en: The birds have been successfully reared in captivity.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟笼养成功。

sentences.en: The front and rear of the car will crumple during a collision.
sentences.cn: 碰撞时，汽车的前部和后部会被撞瘪。

sentences.en: The hall is in the rear of the building.
sentences.cn: 礼堂在大楼的后部.

sentences.en: The Lord Mayor follows at the rear in his gilded coach.
sentences.cn: 市长大人坐在他阔气的马车里在后面跟着。

sentences.en: the press reared up in the wake of the bombings.
sentences.cn: 飞机轰炸之后新闻界又折腾了一番。

sentences.en: the rear door of the car
sentences.cn: 汽车的后门

sentences.en: The rear doors include childproof locks.
sentences.cn: 后门装有防儿童开启的安全锁。

sentences.en: The scout single - handedly penetrated behind the enemy's rear lines.
sentences.cn: 侦察员 单枪匹马 深入敌后.

sentences.en: The thief must have entered by the rear door.
sentences.cn: 小偷一定是从后门进来的.

sentences.en: This nippy new car has fold down rear seats.
sentences.cn: 这辆速度很快的新车配有可以放倒的后座。

sentences.en: Those electing to smoke will be seated at the rear.
sentences.cn: 那些想吸烟的人将坐在后排。

sentences.en: We had to rear it in a nursery and plant it out.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不在苗棚里培育它,然后再把它移植出来.

phrases.tran_cn: adj. 在...的后部（在...的背后）
后悬吊，后悬吊系统；后悬挂装置
后窗，后窗玻璃；后挡风玻璃

trans.tran_en: at or near the back of something, especially a vehicle

trans.tran_cn: 后部，背面，背后，臀部，（舰队或军队的）后方，后尾，殿后部队，〈英口〉厕所
trans.tran_en: the back part of an object, vehicle, or building, or a position at the back of an object or area
The rear of something such as a building or vehicle is the back part of it
to look after a person or animal until they are fully grown
to look after a person or animal until they are fully grown
to look after a person or animal until they are fully grown
